<title level="1" pfs="">[Satinder Morne](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2309)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 32

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Satinder Morne](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2309)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 306</row>

**Perception** +15

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4)

**Skills**
[Gambling Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +12, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +14, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +12, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +12, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +13, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** +1

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
[daggers](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) (6), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [religious symbol of Calistria](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41), ruby ring worth 20 gp, 5 gp

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +15 

</row>

**HP** 75

**Vengeful Sting** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature damages Satinder Morne with a melee Strike **Effect** Satinder Morne makes a melee Strike against the triggering creature. She suffers a –2 penalty on the attack roll but gains a +2 bonus on the damage roll if the Strike hits.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +14 ([thrown 10 ft.](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 piercing

**Divine Spells Prepared** DC 23, attack +13
- **Cantrips (4th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244), [Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266)
- **2nd**
[Calm Emotions](/Spells.aspx?ID=31), [Silence](/Spells.aspx?ID=287), [Undetectable Alignment](/Spells.aspx?ID=348)
- **3rd**
[Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Enthrall](/Spells.aspx?ID=104), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) (×4), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354)

**Cleric Domain Spells 1 Focus Point,** DC 23
- **1st**
[Charming Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=406)

**Divine Font**   _heal_

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   Satinder Morne deals 1d6 extra precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
name: Satinder Morne
